"PSYCHO DEAD" is a third-person survival horror game centered on Elixia, a mysterious girl with psychic powers, who must escape a secret laboratory infested with grotesque and monstrous creatures. Explore a sci-fi setting filled with mystery and danger, where terror awaits at every corner, and discover the truth behind the horrific incident.

author: PlayStation
description:
Projekt Z: Beyond Order will be available in 2026 on PS5.
Wishlist now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011418/

Experience the intense action of battling the undead on PS5 in this thrilling first-person zombie shooter with robust character progression and extensive weapon customization. Set around World War II, take on fast-paced missions or explore the terrifying island in Free Roam mode as one of four survivors, each with their own unique abilities and role in 4-player co-op. Shoot, loot, craft, survive.

#ps5 #ps5games 

Rated Mature
title: Projekt Z: Beyond Order - Horror Game Awards Trailer | PS5 Games

Experience your first taste of the cutting-edge combat in Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7 with the Black Ops 7 Beta. 

Earn in-game rewards including an Operator Skin, Weapon Blueprint, and additional cosmetic items for playing the Beta, which will be immediately available in the Beta once unlocked, and playable in Black Ops 7 once the full game launches.

Pre-order any Digital Edition and get Early Access to the Open Beta!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #cod #callofduty
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Beta Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010853

Experience the brand-new gameplay trailer for Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow, showcasing the immersive VR stealth gameplay that brings the legendary franchise to life like never before on PS VR2.

- Steal with precision - Pickpocket guards, pry open hidden compartments, and bypass locks with tactile VR interactions.
- Master the Shadows - Stick to the darkness, evade patrols, and outmanoeuvre enemies with real-time stealth mechanics.
- Precision & Skill - Master tools like the bow, blackjack, and water arrows with realistic haptic feedback
- Unravel a conspiracy in a city where shadows speak louder than words

Brought to you by Vertigo Games, the award-winning creators of Metro Awakening and Arizona Sunshine, in close collaboration with Eidos-Montréal, Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow is currently in development by Maze Theory and marks the long-awaited return of the legendary Thief franchise.

Coming later this year to Playstation VR2. Wishlist n
title: Thief VR: Legacy of Shadow - Gameplay Trailer | PS VR2 Games

LEGO® Party! is a cross-platform party game for up to four players that's built different! author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/my-hero-academia-alls-justice/

Not once in my entire life… have I gone into battle expecting to lose!

The battle comes to its thrilling conclusion when MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice releases on February 6th, 2026 – available on PlayStation 5!

Pre-order now to receive early access to two playable characters: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/my-hero-academia-alls-justice/

The MY HERO ACADEMIA: All’s Justice Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Season Pass – including 5 additional playable characters to be released post-launch.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the Season Pass, 20 additional costumes, and 7 HUD banners.

#ps5 #ps5games #MHA #MHAAJ
title: My Hero Academia: All’s Justice - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UB0511-PPSA25582_00-0453975088630674

Cowabunga! The biggest day yet for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate has finally arrived. Starting today, players can dive into a massive new update packed with fresh content, new ways to play, and long-awaited surprises. Whether you’ve been with us since launch or you’re just stepping into the fight, this update marks a whole new chapter for the Turtles and their friends.

Here’s what’s new:
- New Playable Hero – Metalhead (paid DLC): Step into the shell of the Turtles’ robotic ally, armed with a full-range laser arsenal and unique artifacts.
- Arcade Mode (Free): A brand-new game mode filled with unpredictable challenge runs, the Hex and Flex system, new biomes, Wraith enemies, and score-chasing fun. We will be releasing new Arcade Mode updates soon, stay tuned for more!
- Pizza in Peril Storyline (Free): Uncover a new narrative arc that ties directly into Arcade Mode.
- Robotics Powers (Fr
title: TMNT: Splintered Fate - 2.0 Update & Metalhead DLC Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EP2377-PPSA25153_00-JWEVOLUTION30000

Hailing from the Cretaceous period, the Ornithomimus has long hind limbs and a large body, as well as a toothless beak. Measuring around 3 metres in length, this swift-footed bird-like dinosaur's name literally means ‘bird mimic’.

Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching 21 October and available to pre-order now on the PlayStation Store.

#PS5 #PS5Games #PlayStation #JurassicWorldEvolution3 #HelpLifeFindAWay #FrontierDevelopment
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Ornithomimus Dinosaur Showcase | PS5 Games
